entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning then light late this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
